text: Ditipriya Roy is an Indian actress who works in Bengali TV shows, movies, and theatre. She is well known for playing the role of Rani Rashmoni in the Bengali TV series Karunamoyee Rani Rashmoni. Some of the movies she has acted in are Avijatrik, Bob Biswas, Aay Khuku Aay, Kolkata Chalantika, and Achena Uttam. == Career == Ditipriya began her television career as a child actress and appeared in shows like Maa, Durga, Aparajito, Byomkesh, Bamakhyapa, Tomay Amay Mile, and Tare Ami Chokhe Dekhini. In 2015, she acted in the movie Rajkahini, directed by Srijit Mukherji. In 2017, she played the lead role in the Bengali TV series Karunamoyee Rani Rashmoni. The show was broadcast on Zee Bangla and had a total of 1,549 episodes. She made her Hindi movie debut with Bob Biswas. == Television == Year Show Channel Character Roles 2008 Durga Star Jalsha Gauri Side Role 2011–2013 Aparajito Rishita / Titli 2013 Tomay Amay Mile Young
